title: How to Put Hotmail on My Desktop

steps.title: Create a new shortcut on your desktop.
steps.content: Create a new shortcut on your desktop. Right-click on an empty space on your desktop, select "New," and then select "Shortcut."

steps.title: Input the web address in the empty field provided.
steps.content: Input the web address in the empty field provided. After creating a new shortcut, a window will prompt up asking you for the location of the shortcut. Just type in www.hotmail.com.

steps.title: Name the shortcut you just created.
steps.content: Name the shortcut you just created. You can name this anything you want, like simply Hotmail or Hotmail Login.

steps.title: Double-click on the shortcut to try it out.
steps.content: Double-click on the shortcut to try it out. It should take you to the Hotmail login page.
